description: Non-material amendment to planning approval 23/0729/FUL for Demolition of the existing vacant school building and associated buildings and the erection of a new Special Education Needs and Disabilities (SEND) school including play areas, multi-use games area, car and minibus parking, cycle and bin storage, hard and soft landscaping, fencing, and associated works. [Variation of condition NS11 Highways Agreement to alter the trigger from 'prior to construction' to 'prior to occupation', variation of condition NS09 Detailed Drainage Design to alter the trigger to exclude ‘site preparation works’ and variation of condition NS08 Biodiverse Roof to ‘prior to installation of biodiverse roof’].
decision_conditions:
Full details of all biodiversity roofs shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority prior to installation of the biodiverse roof. The scheme shall not be implemented other than in accordance with the approved details. 
REASON: To enhance nature conservation interest.
